attributes.action: Stop the sale of loud fireworks
attributes.additional_details:
As a dog owner every year is a struggle... Its not just bonfire night when fireworks are being let off.. Its Xmas.. New year and not just one day.. Sometimes weeks before.. My dog shakes violently and hyperventilates to the point of passing out
I shouldn't have to sedate my dog for weeks on end!!
This is animal cruelty and anyone that hurts an animal is prosecuted normally so stop the sale of noise making fireworks
attributes.background:
I want all noise making fireworks banned
To many dog owners from bonfire night to new year its awful... Noone should have to sedate their pets for something than can be fixed with banning the sale of noise making fireworks

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Make fireworks quieter: Review and reduce the decibel limit on fireworks: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590838

Ban use and sale of non-silent fireworks: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599451
